top_comments.comment: Most of this list is still more stylish than 'trendy items'. Trends come and go, classic staples stay around for a long time

comments_since_last_sample.body: My guy I've been watching your videos and changed my style 🤣🤣🤣🤣what the hell Im not watching your videos on style again no way .
Lol, Jose the only guy to recommend an item one day and then prop it down the next🥸

Josh:- our brand is better than those cheap H&M
Also Josh:- H&M is your go to!
None of them are out of style but u get it when he's doing the PR for h&m
Thr moment something goes out of fashion, thats when it’s actually fire
Next year he’ll say everything on the list is back in style
Bomber still ok, chelsea not ok for muscle and bigger guy, flannel always ok, ripped jeans never ok, jogger should be comfy not tight
